title: The Men Who Tread on the Tiger's Tail

sources.title: The Men Who Tread on the Tiger's Tail
sources.description: The fourth film from Akira Kurosawa is based on a legendary twelfth-century incident in which the lord Yoshitsune and a group of samurai retainers dressed as monks in order to pass through a dangerous enemy checkpoint. The story was dramatized for centuries in Noh and kabuki theater, and here it becomes one of the directorâ€™s most riveting early films.
